label: SpecifiedInspection
comment: The process of performing documented checks, such as on materials or processes, with a focus on discovering deviations, errors or faults related to documented requirements.

datatypeProperties.comment: A specified computer file or program stored in a binary format.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
The inspector executing this specified inspection.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
The indication of whether or not this specified inspection is outsourced.
The result reported for this specified inspection.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
A specified inspection event for this sustainability inspection.
The inspection status specified for this sustainability inspection.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

referencedBy.comment: A specified inspection applicable to this logistics transport movement.
